channel.title: MBallSectionsDR
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from MBallSectionsDR, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Investigate the International Criminal Court’s Prosecutor
item.description: Zohran Mamdani wants Israeli PM Benjamin Netanyahu arrested because of an ICC warrant. But the ICC’s chief prosecutor may himself be guilty of a crime...

item.title: Bondi says DOJ considering going after app developer behind ICE tracking app
item.description: U.S. Attorney General Pam Bondi criticized a new app that allows users to track the movement of Immigration and Customs Enforcement officers, assertin...

item.title: Britain Shows How The Bar For Assisted Suicide Keeps Getting Lower
item.description: The passage of the Leadbeater bill sends a devastating signal: Some lives are no longer worth the cost of care.

item.title: Two Crop Monte: Trump’s Farm Policy Tries to Mitigate Tariff Damage
item.description: This policy would effectively snuff out cheaper, better foreign suppliers to line the pockets of domestic growers and processors.

item.title: A Blow to Trans Insanity, a Victory for Common Sense
item.description: The University of Pennsylvania has announced it will comply with the Trump administration’s policies on Title IX and single-sex sports.

item.title: Iowa Starts the Work of Turning Public Opinion on Abortion
item.description: A new education law should be a model for the nation.

item.title: Judge Blocks Another Trump Order, Proving Alito Was Right About Loopholes In SCOTUS Injunction Ruling
item.description: Days after Justice Samuel Alito warned that a recent Supreme Court ruling had two glaring holes that could be exploited, an Obama-appointed judge appe...

item.title: Judge strikes down Trump policies that deleted transgender pages from govt. websites
item.description: A federal judge has ruled that the White House budget office didn't have the power to order agencies to take down web pages that included information ...

item.title: Like Government? Hug a Billionaire
item.description: Progressives despise rich people until they really need one on hand.

item.title: Mamdani Is A Warning On Where The Next Generation Of The Left Is Heading
item.description: And if Americans don’t wake up, Mamdani’s brand of radical leftism could well be the future of this exceptional republic.

item.title: Bezos’ $56 Million Second Wedding Is A Monument To A Culture That Celebrates Divorce
item.description: Odds are against Bezos’ new marriage given his previous record, age, and relationship conduct.

item.title: In Latest Term, Supreme Court’s ‘Conservative Majority’ Plays By The Left’s Rules
item.description: The Supreme Court continues to grant legitimacy to the leftist revolution that has overtaken and transformed most aspects of our nation.

item.title: In a bid to reduce animal experiments, EPA offers fish, rats for adoption
